decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The proposal would have the edge of the enlargement closest to the eaves of the original roof shall, so far as practicable, less than 0.2 metres from the eaves, measured along the roof slope from the outside edge of the eaves, and therefore would not be within the tolerances of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B, B.2 (bb) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as amended.

Reason : 2 - The proposal has not demonstrated that the materials used in exterior  of the proposed enlargement shall be of a similar appearance to those used in the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, contrary to the tolerances of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A, Condition A.3 (a) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as amended.

Reason : 3 - The proposal has not demonstrated that the rooflights would not protrude more than 0.15 metres beyond the plane of the slope of the original roof when measured from the perpendicular with the external surface of the original roof and is therefore not within the tolerances of Schedule 2, Part 1 Class C of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as amended.
Reason : 4 - The proposal is NOT therefore a lawful development.
description:
CERTIFICATE OF LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT (PROPOSED):
Alterations and extension to roof to form end gable; rear dormer; two rooflights in front roofslope
